description:
Ryuubi and her party come Kousonsan`s city. Kousonsan welcomes them and is surprised that Ryuubi comes with them. A game of wits, strength and technique ensues with the ornate sword as the prize.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kousonsan, Enshou to Shiyuu o Kesseru no Koto
公孫賛, 袁紹と雌雄を決するのこと
